description: This file defines a 'Pagination' UI component using LightningJS framework, with internal state management, navigation logic, and accessibility features.

classes.name: Pagination
classes.description: A LightningJS component for pagination controls, including next/prev buttons and display labels.

methods.name: $prev
methods.description: Navigate to the previous page if total results are available.

methods.name: $next
methods.description: Navigate to the next page if total results are available.
